overview.title: Overview
overview.text: Welcome to MelodyMind! Your goal is to answer questions about songs, artists, and albums from different music genres. Choose a genre and test your knowledge. The more questions you answer correctly, the more points you'll earn.

difficultyLevels.title: Difficulty Levels
difficultyLevels.intro: There are three difficulty levels you can choose from:

easy.title: Easy
easy.description: 10 questions per round. Perfect for refreshing your knowledge and having fun

medium.title: Medium
medium.description: 15 questions per round. A challenge for advanced music lovers

hard.title: Hard
hard.description: 20 questions per round. Only for true music experts!

titles.intro: Each difficulty level has its own title that you can unlock:

novice.title: Music Novice
novice.description: All questions answered correctly in easy mode

master.title: Music Master
master.description: All questions answered correctly in medium mode

legend.title: Music Legend
legend.description: All questions answered correctly in hard mode

goldenRecords.title: Golden Records
goldenRecords.intro: When you answer all questions in a category correctly, you'll receive a golden record:

rankings.title: Rankings
rankings.description: The ranking system compares you with other players. Your placement in the Top 10 is based on your collected points in all categories

types.genre: Genre-specific ranking: Best players of a genre
types.overall: Overall ranking: Best players across all categories

tips.startEasy: Start in easy mode to get a feel for the game
tips.chooseStrengths: Choose your strengths and play the genres you're confident in
tips.practice: Practice regularly to improve your score
tips.accuracy: Accuracy over speed – read each question carefully
